quiz.question: What can eLearning do for you in your marketing program?
answers: Deliver a coherent, repeatable message to all stakeholders
Build brand loyalty in distribution channels
quiz.feedback: Using eLearning in your marketing program can deliver coherent, repeatable content, build brand loyalty, provide valuable analytics, as well as many other things.

quiz.question: What percentage of compliance training is delivered online?
quiz.feedback: More than 50% of compliance training is being delivered online for a variety of reasons.  Most important is consistency.

quiz.question: eLearning is a great way to reach, educate and motivate:
quiz.feedback: eLearning is a great way to reach, educate and motivate everyone, internal and external.

quiz.question: What is the first step to a successful eLearning program?
answers: Upload your how to videos to your YouTube channel
Get your current live training staff to deliver their next session in front of a video camera
Establish the goals of your eLearning effort and then design a program that will achieve those goals
quiz.feedback: Through our own experience, we know that the first step for any successful eLearning program is to establish your goals.

quiz.question: Why not just put my support videos on my YouTube channel?
answers: All content uploaded to YouTube becomes property of Google and your rights to it are relinquished
YouTube will recommend videos outside of your brand, possibly even to a competitor's page
Your viewer is taken offsite and to the world of funny cat videos
quiz.feedback: Using YouTube to host your training videos has many differnt downfalls.
